subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[dredge]]; to [[dig]]
# to [[burst]]; to [[break]]; to [[breach]]
# to [[decide]]; to [[determine]]
# to [[decide]] the [[outcome]]; to [[contest]]
# to [[judge]]; to [[pronounce]] the [[verdict]]
# to [[execute]]; to [[put to death]]
# [[definitely]]; [[certainly]]
# [[for worlds]]
